categories: Category:Military officers of the Sith Empire

nodes.text: The Minister of War was a ministerial post in the Sith Empire during and after the Great Galactic War. Shareis held the post in 3660 BBY.

The Minister of War has only been mentioned in the biography of Grand Moff Rycus Kilran on swtor.com and in some instances in game. In one such instance, during the Cold War Minister of Intelligence tells Cipher Nine that he has to rush to a meeting with Darth Baras and Minister of War to discuss possible renewal of hostilities.
